revised_title: Case Study: Fatal Contusion of the Heart from a Blunt Trauma
tldr: This case study describes a young boy who experienced a palpitation of the heart after receiving a blow to the chest from a plate pushed by his master. Despite medical treatment, the boy died, and an autopsy revealed a contusion of the heart with gangrene and adhesion to the pericardium. The authors discuss the possible causes and consequences of such injuries.
